import React from "react"; import { Fade, Slide } from "react-reveal"; import { useState } from 'react'; import * as emailjs from 'emailjs-com'; import{ init } from 'emailjs-com'; init("user_Dlt8QI64Z829ywrUhkPec"); export default function Contact() { const [email,setemail] = useState(''); const [subject,setsubject] = useState(''); const [message,setmessage] = useState(''); const [name,setname] = useState(''); function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() let templateParams = { from_name: email, to_name: 'Admin', subject: subject, message: message, } emailjs.send( 'service_v9fx18o', 'template_ept3bqy', templateParams, 'user_Dlt8QI64Z829ywrUhkPec' ) alert('Feedback or Queries sent to admin. You will get reply soon.... ') setemail(''); setsubject(''); setmessage(''); setname(''); } return (
